Text: Al-Karaji:  His three principal surviving works are mathematical: "Al-Badi' fi'l-hisab" ("Wonderful on calculation"), "Al-Fakhri fi'l-jabr wa'l-muqabala" ("Glorious on algebra"), and "Al-Kafi fi'l-hisab" ("Sufficient on calculation").
